answers.answer: The basic package for medical devices includes ENT and ostomy prosthetic devices, urinary retention/incontinence devices, limb prostheses, spine/limb orthoses, footwear orthopedics, devices for visual impairment, oxygen therapy/non-invasive ventilation equipment, aerosol therapy devices, walking devices, and external breast prostheses.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: A patient or their representative submits an application to the health insurance house, receives an approval decision if accepted, and then contacts a contracted provider with the decision and medical prescription to get the device.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.

answers.answer: The patient or a representative submits an application along with required documents to the health insurance house, which then analyzes the application and issues an approval decision within three working days if accepted.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.

answers.answer: Medical prescriptions for devices are issued by a doctor who is in a contractual relation with the health insurance house.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: To apply, a copy of the ID, the medical prescription for the device, and a classification certificate for oxygen therapy/non-invasive ventilation equipment (if applicable) are needed. For children up to 14, a copy of the birth certificate and a prescription specifying the child's address are required.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.

answers.answer: The health insurance house is obligated to analyze and decide on the acceptance or rejection of an application within no more than 3 working days from its registration date.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.

answers.answer: If requests for devices exceed the approved monthly fund, priority lists are established by device category.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.

answers.answer: Beneficiaries of Emergency Ordinance no.15/2022, coming from the armed conflict in Ukraine, are not requested any personal contribution for medical devices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: Medical devices are issued to patients only by providers who are under contract with the health insurance house.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: Health insurance houses contract with doctors and providers, receive and process applications, analyze and decide on acceptance or rejection, issue approval decisions for procurement/rental, and manage funds for devices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Eligibility for medical device coverage is determined based on a medical prescription issued by a doctor in contractual relation with the health insurance house, and potentially a classification certificate for specific devices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A medical prescription for a device loses its validity if it is not submitted to the health insurance company within 30 days from its date of issue.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: The basic package includes ENT prosthetic devices, ostomy prosthetic devices, urinary retention/incontinence devices, limb prostheses, spine/limb orthoses, footwear orthopedics, devices for visual impairment, oxygen therapy/non-invasive ventilation equipment, aerosol therapy devices, walking devices, and external breast prostheses.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: Documents for medical device applications can be submitted to the health insurance house either by post or online.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'The procedure for obtaining the devices'.

answers.answer: For certain medical devices with prices higher than those settled by CNAS, the insured person may be required to cover an additional amount of money.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-devices and read the section under 'Medical devices'.
